name: DonaTuTiempo
short_description: We want to combine freelancer's markets with crowdfunding. Here in Mexico people want to get something in exchange of their donation and to a certain point I think it's not so bad. So we need a crowdfunding website where you can create profiles for causes but on the other hand there should also be a freelance market where freelancers get to post their profiles and causes they support. Also employers should post projects. In this site both employers and freelancers get together to help others.
summary: We want to combine freelancer's markets with crowdfunding.
